author: eddie moreland

review: Just got the Roku stick and tried to set it up today. Kept getting error 011. Went through suggested troubleshooting on Roku website: unplug power from Roku, unplug power from modem/router, reset Roku. None of this worked. Also, the remote stopped working with the Roku.  Tried text chat and was 97th in line with estimated 48 minute wait. Tried calling the 800 number while waiting for chat, but got a busy signal. Went back to the website to wait for live chat, but was disconnected after about 10 minutes. Called the 800 number again and this time was put on hold. Waited on hold for about 25 minutes, then finally was able to speak to a person. He told me that the Roku servers were down, but walked me through the setup process again to make sure the device was working. He instructed me on pairing the remote again, so at least that was working. However, nothing could be done to get this $50 piece of plastic working because supposedly the servers are down today. He informed me that they are working on it, and that I should try again tomorrow. Wow, what a wonderful experience trying out a new product. I have had an Apple TV box for the last 5 years and have NEVER had this issue. I thought the Roku stick would be a step up, but, boy, am I sorry I wasted that money now.  Even if the device works tomorrow, this experience has killed my trust in this company and I would not recommend Roku to anyone!
author: Hapa

review: I use a Roku 2 and have given several as gifts. They've worked flawlessly. I gave the Roku Stick as a gift because this model could be plugged right into the TV to hide some cords on their mounted TV. Also, because the remote seems to work really, really well from anywhere in their large living room, something the Roku 2s aren't able to do without turning the Roku box. However, every so often the Roku Stick freezes on the screensaver, or gets stuck on the loading bouncy screen for days until it's manually reset, or the remote loses it's connection to the Roku Stick and also has to be reset. The workarounds do the trick, but it has been frustrating to have to do this every few weeks out of the first three weeks of use... Everything else about it has been fine.
